books.author: by J.D. Robb
books.description: Eve Dallas scours tattoo parlors and strip joints for clues to the cause of Lyle Pickering’s mysterious death.
books.name: CONNECTIONS IN DEATH

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Jonathan Kellerman
books.description: Milo Sturgis and Alex Delaware investigate the death of a stranger at a wedding reception.
books.name: THE WEDDING GUEST

books.author: by Marlon James
books.description: A loner named Tracker teams up with a group of unusual characters in search of a mysterious boy.
books.name: BLACK LEOPARD, RED WOLF

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Pam Jenoff
books.description: Grace Healey investigates the fates of 12 women who were sent to occupied Europe to help the resistance during World War II.
books.name: THE LOST GIRLS OF PARIS

books.author: by Sophie Kinsella
books.description: A series of debts between Fixie Farr and a handsome stranger involves her childhood crush.
books.name: I OWE YOU ONE

books.author: by Greer Hendricks and Sarah Pekkanen
books.description: Jessica Farris’s life unravels when she signs up for Dr. Shields’s psychology study.
books.name: AN ANONYMOUS GIRL

books.author: by Tayari Jones
books.description: A newlywed couple's relationship is tested when the husband is sentenced to 12 years in prison.
books.name: AN AMERICAN MARRIAGE

books.author: by Gail Honeyman
books.description: A young woman’s well-ordered life is disrupted by the I.T. guy from her office.
books.name: ELEANOR OLIPHANT IS COMPLETELY FINE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A decorated World War II veteran shoots and kills a pastor inside a Mississippi church.
books.name: THE RECKONING

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: The second book in the Torpedo Ink series. Complications rev up between Breezy and Steele.
books.name: VENGEANCE ROAD

books.author: by Jane Harper
books.description: Nathan and Bub Bright find their other brother dead at the border of their cattle ranches in the Australian outback.
books.name: THE LOST MAN

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: A magazine columnist meets an array of Hollywood professionals when a producer turns a story about her grandmother into a TV series.
books.name: THE CAST
